name: Future Gun
description:
IMPORTANT

The game is in French only.

Presentation

Made in November 2021 for the Video Games Lab Game Jam 2021 by At0mium.

It was my eigth game jam.

The theme was "Arcade".

Tools

Gamemaker Studio: 2, Aseprite, Bosca Ceoil, Bfxr, Beesbusy.

Credits

I did everything by myself during the jam, except:

- The CTR effect is a plugin made by Trixellized: https://trixelized.itch.io/bjortfx

Gameplay

The game is in French only.

The game is a rail shooter. You cannot die, but you can lose points.

Tips (spoiler)

- What gives points: destroying an enemy, destroying a projectile.

- What removes points: destroying an ally, getting hit.

- The ending dialog is different depending on how many points you have. The best ending is above 4000 points.
